name: Dungeons of Aarkos
description:
You, who has had their soul captured by the evil lord of dungeons:
Complete all of the dungeons in order to expose Aarkos, the demon who took your soul.
But be carefull! Should you fail, you must start all over again!

This world features procedurally generated dungeons, challenging bosses, and numerous interesting mechnics to try out!

Can your speed, tenacity and skill outmatch the evil-lord's  power, allong with his minions before him?

Developed by:
Lead Developer + Programmer: Adrian Kawecki
Designer: Satya Wirawan
